title: Mechanical
content:
FRONT:
 Bracket to Block Bolts .................... 41 Nm (30 ft. lbs.)
 Insulator Nuts .................... 102 Nm (75 ft. lbs.)

REAR:
 Insulator to Crossmember .................... 41 Nm (30 ft. lbs.)
 Support Bracket Flange Nuts .................... 41 Nm (30 ft. lbs.)
